description: Observations on a proposed development within the adjoining Borough of Southwark with respect to: Minor material amendment to planning permission of 16/AP/0631 for erection of a new bridge linking the main Morley College building with the Morley Gallery across King Edward Walk including alterations to the entrance of the Morley Gallery on St Georges Road and extensions to the Morley Gallery at first, second and roof level to accommodate the new bridge, circulation space, lift overrun and other elevational alterations. [Forming part of a wider development including alterations to the main entrance area and display window of the main Morley College Building and extensions to the Emma Cons Hall and other elevational alterations. These elements of the development fall within the London Borough of Lambeth]. The proposed amendments include the introduction of plant at first floor level; change of material top liftoverrun; and other minor elevational amendments. at: MORLEY COLLEGE, KING EDWARD WALK, LONDON, SE1 7HT
